data.name: Delgado misión, Nojpeten massacre
data.desc: Franciscan Fray Diego Delgado carries misión to Ma towns by Lake Peten Itza, via Tipu and with Tipu residents, all of whom are killed at Lake Peten Itza, along with a rescue party sent after them
data.locn: Sacalum [Chachanha?], Tipuj, Lake Peten Itza, Bacalar
data.agents_sp: Diego Delgado, Corp Fulano de Acosta 12 men / later Bernardino Ek 2 Sp men sev Ma men
data.prim_n: Egerton MS 1791 / MEXICO,141 / MEXICO,145 [Petition by Francisco Camul, 1624]  / MEXICO,246 [Méritos y servicios de Juan Bernardo Casanova, 1627] / Maya R [missg] / Cogolludo lib 10 cap 2-3 / Cardenas 76
data.lit_n: Jones 176 / Awe 347 / Graham 244-245 / Soza [missg] = 2 ed vol 2 pp 439-440
